hero.title: CollapseLoader
hero.subtitle: Secure loader for Minecraft clients
hero.desc: An open-source loader. All clients are scanned for malware; client and backend code are public to ensure transparency.

why.title: Why Choose CollapseLoader?
why.desc: A modern, community-driven loader engineered for transparency and security.

open.title: Open Source
open.desc: Complete source code is available on GitHub. No hidden data collection; community review ensures integrity.

modern.title: Modern and Fast
modern.desc: Built with Rust and Tauri for high performance on Windows and Linux.

safe.title: Secure
safe.desc: All clients are scanned for malware. Security is our primary concern.

cloud.title: Cloud Sync
cloud.desc: Sign in to synchronize Minecraft accounts, settings, and favorite clients across devices.

custom.title: Customization
custom.desc: Customize the loader's appearance. Custom CSS is supported.

cord.title: CordShare
cord.desc: Share coordinates to display your in-game location, including unloaded chunks.

irc.title: IRC
irc.desc: Integrated IRC chat for user communication.

download.title: Get Started
download.desc: Download the latest stable release of CollapseLoader.
download.source_code_desc: View the complete source code on GitHub.
download.nightly_desc: Nightly builds are generated from recent changes and may be unstable; intended for testing.
download.aur_note: If you're on Linux, AUR packages are available: {pkg1} and {pkg2}.

footer.desc: Open-source Minecraft client loader. Licensed under GPL-3.0.
footer.not_affiliated: Minecraft is a trademark of Mojang Studios. This project is not affiliated with Mojang Studios.

analytics.title: CollapseLoader Analytics
analytics.desc: Live statistics on usage and downloads.

community.title: Join the Community
community.desc: Get updates, ask questions, and share feedback.
community.discord_desc: Chat with the community and get support.
